name: Iron Guardian
damage_immunities: fire, poison, psychic; damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The guardian makes two sword attacks.

actions.name: Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The guardian exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw  taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

reactions.name: Deflection
reactions.desc: When missed by a ranged attack by a creature the guardian can see, the guardian redirects the attack against a creature within 60 feet that it can see. The original attacker must reroll the attack against the new target.

special_abilities.name: Fire Absorption
special_abilities.desc: When the guardian is subjected to fire damage, it instead regains hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Constructed Nature
special_abilities.desc: Guardians dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.
